about_the_game: The Annie and the Ai (Original Soundtrack) features all of the music found in game. Across 23 tracks, the music has been assembled and mixed specifically for the best listening experience outside of gameplay. Includes mp3 and wav files.
detailed_description: The Annie and the Ai (Original Soundtrack) features all of the music found in game. Across 23 tracks, the music has been assembled and mixed specifically for the best listening experience outside of gameplay. Includes mp3 and wav files.
